sections.heading: Owner,
sections.text: operator or manager of oil pipeline declared to be common carrier.

sections.heading: Operation
sections.text:
as intrastate carrier without certificate of public convenience and necessity

prohibited.

sections.heading: Certificate
sections.text:
of public convenience and necessity: Hearing; considerations; terms and

conditions.

sections.heading: Right
sections.text:
to construct and maintain pipeline along, on or under public stream or road:

Conditions; compensation for damage to public road.

sections.heading: Power
sections.text:
of Commission to establish and enforce rates and regulations; procedure;

reimbursement of excessive charges.

sections.heading: Exchange
Publication
sections.text:
of tariffs; reports; investigation of books; limitation on disclosure of

reports by Commission; hearings and enforcement of orders.

sections.heading: Discrimination
sections.text:
between shippers or in charging for services prohibited; ratable transportation

when production exceeds capacity of pipeline.

sections.heading: Discrimination
sections.text: in receipt and transportation of crude oil or petroleum prohibited.

sections.heading: Regulations
sections.text: of Commission to prevent waste of oil or dangerous operations.
